Announcements & News.
- Here you can find useful info about upcoming changes like new events, updates, fixes and other news. Its strongly recommended to check those pserver daily, stay informed all the time, it may be important!

Server Information.
- Here you can find all the informations about server like rates, detailed server features, all our event list and their reward as well some other gameplay informations so make sure to check here for more server details.
Information
General Information
It took us more than 8 months to develop this great server. Server files are based in latest l2j sources and 100% stable and buggless.
Server Moto
Eros-War is not a classical of nowadays server where you should just farm to get equipment or enhance your stuff with overrated rates etc. We tried to make a completely diferent gameplay where players will never get bored! To become the best you will need to corporate complete achievements and work hard! Join now and be the best one.
Server Features
Main Npc's: There are GM-Shop, Global Gatekeepers, Community Board with status and Commands and much more! Vote Reward Engine: Vote for our server and get special rewards! Scheme Buffer: Use our scheme buffer and gain gaming time! PC Bang Points System: Spend your pc bang points to get stuff!
Gameplay Information Max Buff Amount: 27+4 Dances & Songs: 12 Auto Loot: Enabled Player Spawn Protection: 30 Seconds Weight Limit: x100 Max Subclasses: 5 Max Subclass Level: 85 Subclass Without Quest: Enabled Class Master: Enabled Auto Learn Skills: Enabled


Server statistics
- Here you can check various server statistics like top pvp or pk, clan status, top online and others. You can also check raid status and to see if they are alive or not.
